title: How To Set Up An Express API Backend Project With PostgreSQL â€” Smashing Magazine
excerpt: In this article, Chidi Orji will create a set of API endpoints using [Express](https://expressjs.com/) from scratch in ES6 syntax, and cover some development best practices. Find out how all the pieces work together as you create a small project using Continuous Integration and Test-Driven Development before deploying to Heroku.
